edu.drexel.cs.jah473.distance

Interface DistanceFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLatLonDist, ChebyshevDistance, EquirectangularDistance, EuclideanDistance, HaversineDistance, ManhattanDistance, SquaredEquirectangularDistance, SquaredEuclideanDistance
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface DistanceFunction
    Interface to be implemented with a custom distance function.
    Author:
    Justin Horvitz

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distanceBetween(KDPoint point1, KDPoint point2)
      Calculates the distance between two points using the formula specific to the implementing class.

    • Method Detail

      • distanceBetween

        double distanceBetween(KDPoint point1,
                       KDPoint point2)
        Calculates the distance between two points using the formula specific to the implementing class.
        Parameters:
        point1 - the first point
        point2 - the second point
        Returns:
        the distance between point1 and point2
